content: pattern was updated please download again https //drive google com/file/d/1tsxxusmf_yezq1nzmvg4eczrgypsuhjf/view usp=sharing keep your needles busy and your feet warm with this cozy socks pattern i was inspired by traditional norwegian snowflake patterns and designed an easy version for making these socks with a border on the top and bottom of the snowflake you can use any fingering weight yarn 4ply sock yarn you like in a white dark blue and brown-orange color or any colors you prefer note that this isn t a tutorial on how to knit socks in general so this is for people who probably already know how to knit socks and how to work stranded colorwork the pattern gives you basic information and the color charts you need it makes use of the square/dutch heel and the barn toe if you don t know how to knit these there are a lot of tutorials online this pattern wasn t test-knitted except by me i m a private knitter and this is my first pattern ever so i apologize for any mistakes please write me on ravelry if you find any i hope you enjoy knitting **update there was something wrong with the measurements for the foot in inches i updated the pattern consider to download it again ** i also updated the pattern file because it s a square or dutch heel that i used just google how to knit a square dutch heel and you will find some tutorials i think it s easy to knit once you get the hang of it has a nice fit and makes it possible to knit the heel in a different color just make sure to switch back to your main color before starting with the the gusset rounds
